text: @RahulGandhi Hey! You long mouthed guy ! Do you have any solution to fight COVID-19 virus? If yes , spit it out in detail and if no then shut your mouth at once but for heaven sake stop fooling people of this country and rather go and help Italy to root this virus out from there.
